package com.cms.mapper;

import org.apache.ibatis.annotations.Mapper;

import com.cms.pojo.CmsNoteInfo;
import org.apache.ibatis.annotations.Param;

import java.util.Date;
import java.util.List;

@Mapper
public interface CmsNoteInfoMapper {
    /**
     * This method was generated by MyBatis Generator.
     * This method corresponds to the database table cms_note_info
     *
     * @mbg.generated
     */
    int deleteByPrimaryKey(Integer cmsNoteId);

    /**
     * This method was generated by MyBatis Generator.
     * This method corresponds to the database table cms_note_info
     *
     * @mbg.generated
     */
    int insert(CmsNoteInfo record);

    /**
     * This method was generated by MyBatis Generator.
     * This method corresponds to the database table cms_note_info
     *
     * @mbg.generated
     */
    int insertSelective(CmsNoteInfo record);

    /**
     * This method was generated by MyBatis Generator.
     * This method corresponds to the database table cms_note_info
     *
     * @mbg.generated
     */
    CmsNoteInfo selectByPrimaryKey(Integer cmsNoteId);

    /**
     * This method was generated by MyBatis Generator.
     * This method corresponds to the database table cms_note_info
     *
     * @mbg.generated
     */
    int updateByPrimaryKeySelective(CmsNoteInfo record);

    /**
     * This method was generated by MyBatis Generator.
     * This method corresponds to the database table cms_note_info
     *
     * @mbg.generated
     */
    int updateByPrimaryKey(CmsNoteInfo record);

    /**
     * 查询所有的短信详单
     * @return
     */
    List<CmsNoteInfo> findAll();

    /**
     * 根据fromid查询短信详单
     * @param fromId 发送方id
     * @return
     */
    List<CmsNoteInfo> findByFromId(@Param("fromId")Integer fromId);
    /***
     * 按照时间段和发送人id查询短信详单
     * @param fromId
     * @param startTime
     * @param endTime
     * @return
     */
    List<CmsNoteInfo> findByFromIdAndTime(@Param("fromId") Integer fromId,
                                          @Param("startTime") Date startTime,
                                          @Param("endTime") Date endTime);

    Integer findCountByPhoneAndTime(@Param("phoneNum") String phoneNum,
                                    @Param("startTime") Date startTime,
                                    @Param("endTime") Date endTime);
}
